analysis: The current project files focus on a test website with a black hole theme. The CSS file needs to be completed with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file requires a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices. The JavaScript file has syntax errors in the showSlide function and needs to be completed to ensure all functions are properly implemented.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
